sentences.en: A pheasant called from the fields . Jack , the collie, barked twice out in the yard.
sentences.cn: 田野有一只山鸡鸣叫, 杰克----那小狗----在场院里吠了两声.

sentences.en: A pheasant is a delicacy we seldom can enjoy.
sentences.cn: 野鸡是我们很少能品尝到的美味.

sentences.en: A pheasant is a rare delicacy we seldom can enjoy.
sentences.cn: 野鸡是我们很少能品尝到的异味美食.

sentences.en: A pure white pheasant grows up there in the mountains.
sentences.cn: 山上出一种纯白色的雉鸡.

sentences.en: Black - necked Bar - tailed Pheasant lay eggs from late of March to May.
sentences.cn: 笼养黑颈长尾雉于三月中下旬开始产卵,五月下旬产卵结束.

sentences.en: Company town pheasant service is adopted dog service, gallinaceous seedling sends come.
sentences.cn: 镇山鸡服务公司采取跟踪服务, 鸡苗送上门.包疫病防治,包饲料供给,包产品销售.

sentences.en: Fresh October brings the pheasant, then to gather nuts is pleasant.
sentences.cn: 凉爽的十月带来野鸡, 采集干果使人们欢喜.

sentences.en: Has sky - scraping wheel park opened the Suzhou golden pheasant lake already all?
sentences.cn: 苏州金鸡湖摩天轮公园已经都开放了 么 ?

sentences.en: I was aiming at a pheasant and he shot it in front of my hide.
sentences.cn: 我正在瞄准一只雉而且他在我之前射击它.

sentences.en: Jaws long and strong, capable a hare or a pheasant.
sentences.cn: 长而有力, 有能力叼回野兔或野鸡.

sentences.en: Now , do you mind if I go back to a delicious roast pheasant?
sentences.cn: 怎么样, 我可以回去吃那只喷香的烤野鸡了 吧 ?

sentences.en: The sauce is good with other roasted game birds, too, not just pheasant.
sentences.cn: 这种调味汁不但配野鸡好吃，配其他烤猎鸟也不错。

sentences.en: The seasonal changes of habitats of Elliot's pheasant [ J ].
sentences.cn: 白颈长尾雉栖息地的季节变化 [ J ].

sentences.en: We had roasted pheasant for dinner.
Wild animals are wild pheasant, chicken and other blue horse.
sentences.cn: 野生动物有野雉 、 蓝马鸡等.

trans.tran_en: a large bird with a long tail, often shot for food, or the meat of this bird
